name: Y2K, OMG!
description:
Madison and Taylor are stuck at home because of Madison's conspiracy theory loving Dad. When Y2K splits the world into two divergent timelines, they must search for clues to find a Windows 98 disk to save the world and themselves from Y2K. 

A Game Jam game created by 1999 Like It's Party, and combined efforts of Johannes Wolf, Claas Gramann, Sahlia Wong, Samantha Bennett, and Kris Karli
